comments.body:
(This is not related to this pr though...) Can we already support column stats for intervals? Can you check?
https://github.com/apache/spark/blob/16f1b23d75c0b44aac61111bfb2ae9bb0f3fab68/sql/core/src/main/scala/org/apache/spark/sql/execution/command/AnalyzeColumnCommand.scala#L139
https://github.com/apache/spark/blob/16f1b23d75c0b44aac61111bfb2ae9bb0f3fab68/sql/core/src/main/scala/org/apache/spark/sql/execution/command/CommandUtils.scala#L238
yes, these can be set to true for intervals
Ah, I see. Thanks for the check. If you have time, do you wanna make a pr for that?
yea, I'd like to make a followup after this pull request, thanks for noticing me this.
